No_MedOp_O2.display_name: Medical Operators don't wrongly restore oxygen

BrokenTurrets.display_name: Fix turret names disappearing after repair

HarvestMusic.display_name: No uplifting music if Psychotronics harvest complete

Faux_Cigar_Removal.display_name: Remove real-looking but non-interactable cigar decals

GibLogic.display_name: Gib logic improvements in special encounters

Morgan_CrewQ_Emails.display_name: Morgan's Crew Quarters workstation has emails

Displayed_Names.display_name: Adds names to objects when hovered over and fixes interaction texts

Danielle_NotOnRoster.display_name: Danielle Sho not longer on the roster, like January says

FoodUIFix.display_name: All psi-restoring food items display restored psi in the UI

Hacking_TimeChanges.display_name: Hacking II no longer uniquely difficult

Horizontal_Psi_Hypos.description: One cell wide horizontally and two cells tall vertically.
